title: JOURNEY ACROSS WORLDS: ACTION + ADVENTURE MUSIC
description: 600MB+ of AAA quality live orchestral, metal, & electronic music loops & stingers!
longDescription:
Journey Across Worlds: Action + Adventure Music is a collection of over 60 flexible loops, stingers, and SFX, all meticulously crafted for use in action games of all sorts and sizes! This pack features pieces recorded by live orchestras and soloists, bringing you that AAA music quality at an unbeatable price. Whether you’re looking for traditional/epic orchestral for your fantasy RPG, metal for your FPS, electronic for a platformer, or ambient, or world music, it’s all here in this pack!


Journey Across Worlds: Action + Adventure Music - Full Soundcloud Preview


For full package details/documentation (track tempo, meter, etc.), please visit this page. *This documentation is also included in your download.

Individual Track Purchase + Download Options Coming Soon!

technicalDetails:
Format: .wav - stereo

Number of Audio Wavs: 63

Number of Audio Cues: 63

Sample rate / bit rate: 44,100 Hz / 1,411 Kbps

Does music loop: Yes

Minutes of audio provided: 67 Minutes

Intended Platforms: All Platforms

For full package details (track tempo, meter, etc.), please visit this page.

*Tracks with LOOP in the title loop seamlessly when properly programmed.
